instructions.as_text:
BACK
Using 3.75mm needles cast on 63
(67, 71, 75, 81, 85, 89, 93) sts.
Row 1 - K1, * P1, K1, rept from * to
end.
Row 2 - P1, * K1, P1, rept from * to
end.
Rept the last 2 rows for 6.5 cm (2
1/2 ins) finishing on a 1st row.
Next row (inc row) - Rib 4 (6, 3,
5, 4, 6, 8, 5), * inc in next st, rib 5 (5,
6, 6, 7, 7, 7, 8), rept from * to last 5
(7, 5, 7, 5, 7, 9, 7) sts, inc in next st,
rib to end 73 (77, 81, 85, 91, 95, 99,
103) sts.
Change to 4.5mm needles.
Continue in st st until work
measures 34.5 (37, 38, 38, 38, 38,
38, 38) cm 13 1/2 (14 1/2 , 15, 15, 15,
15, 15, 15) ins from commencement
finishing on a P row.
Shape armholes
Cast off 3 (4, 4, 5, 5, 6, 6, 7) sts at
beg of next 2 rows.
76 (81, 86, 91, 97, 102, 107) cm
30 (32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42) inch
sizes only. Work 2 rows.
Next row - K1, sl 1, K1, psso, K to
last 3sts, K2tog, K1.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 4 rows 0 (0, 1, 2, 0, 0,
0) times more. 65 (67, 69, 69, 79, 81,
85) sts.
All sizes
Next row - K1, sl 1, K1, psso, K to
last 3sts, K2tog, K1.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 2 rows until 25 (25, 27,
27, 27, 27, 29, 29) sts remain finishing
on a P row.
Sl sts onto a st holder. Break off
yarn.

LEFT FRONT
Using 3.75mm needles, cast on 29
(31, 33, 35, 39, 41, 43, 43) sts.
Work 6.5 cm (2 1/2 ins) in rib as
given for back finishing on a 1st row.
Next row (inc row) - Rib 4 (3, 4,
5, 5, 5, 6, 3), * inc in next st, rib 4 (5,
5, 5, 8, 9, 9, 6), rept from * to last 5
(4, 5, 6, 7, 6, 7, 5) sts, inc in next st,
rib to end. 34 (36, 38, 40, 43, 45, 47,
49) sts.
Change to 4.5mm needles.
Continue in st st until Front
measures same as Back to armholes
finishing on a P row.
Shape armhole
Cast off 3 (4, 4, 5, 5, 6, 6, 7) sts at
beg of next row.
Work 1 row.
76 (81, 86, 91, 97, 102, 107) cm
30 (32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42) inch
sizes only.
Work 2 rows.
Next row - K1, sl 1, K1, psso, K to
end.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 4 rows 0 (0, 1, 2, 0, 0,
0) times more. 30 (31, 32, 32, 37, 38,
40) sts.
All sizes
Next row - K1, sl 1, K1, psso, K to
end.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 2 rows until 16 (17, 19,
19, 20, 20, 21, 21) sts remain finishing
at front edge.
Shape neck
** Next row - Cast off 4 sts, work
to end.
Dec 1 st at armhole edge as before
at the same time dec 1 st at neck
edge on every row until 6 (7, 7, 7, 8,
8, 8, 8) sts remain.
Continue to dec at armhole edge
only until 2 sts remain. K2tog.
Fasten off. **

RIGHT FRONT
Work as instructions given for left
front to armhole finishing on a K
row.
Shape armhole
Cast off 3 (4, 4, 5, 5, 6, 6, 7) sts at
beg of next row.
76 (81, 86, 91, 97, 102, 107) cm
30 (32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42) inch
sizes only.
Work 2 rows.
Next row - K to last 3 sts, K2tog,
K1.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 4 rows 0 (0, 1, 2, 0, 0,
0) times more. 30 (31, 32, 32, 37, 38,
40) sts.
All sizes
Next row - K to last 3 sts, K2tog,
K1.
Next row - Purl.
Rept the last 2 rows until 16 (17, 19,
19, 20, 20, 21, 21) sts remain finishing
at front edge.
Shape neck
Work from ** to ** of Left Front.

SLEEVES (both alike)
Using 3.75 mm needles, cast on 27
(29, 29, 31, 31, 33, 33, 35) sts.
Work 5 cm (2 ins) in rib as given for
Back finishing on a 1st row.
Next row (inc row) - Rib 4 (5, 5,
4, 4, 4, 4, 5), * inc in next st, rib 5 (5,
5, 6, 6, 7, 7, 7) rept from * to last 5
(6, 6, 6, 6, 5, 5, 6) sts, inc in next st,
rib to end. 31 (33, 33, 35, 35, 37, 37,
39) sts.
Change to 4.5mm needles.
Continue in st st, inc 1 st at each
end of the needle on the 5th and
every following 6th row until 47 (45,
51, 49, 57, 59, 67, 69) sts are on the
needle.
76 (81, 86, 91, 97, 102) cm 30
(32, 34, 36, 38, 40) inch sizes
only.
Inc 1 st at each end of the needle on
every following 8th row until 55 (57,
59, 61, 63, 65) sts are on the needle.
All sizes
Continue without further inc until
sleeve measures 42 (43, 44.5, 45.5,
45.5, 45.5, 45.5, 45.5) cm 16 1/2 (17,
17 1/2 , 18, 18, 18, 18, 18) ins from
commencement finishing on a P row.
Shape top
Cast off 3 (4, 4, 5, 5, 6, 6, 7) sts at
beg of next 2 rows.
Work 2 rows.
5th row - K1, sl 1, K1, psso, K to
last 3 sts, K2tog, K1.
6th row - Purl.
Rept the last 4 rows 1 (2, 3, 5, 6, 7,
7, 7) times more, then the 5th and
6th rows only until 9 (9, 9, 9, 11, 11,
11, 11) sts remain finishing on a P
row.
Sl sts onto a safety pin. Break off
yarn.

components.name: making up
joins: Pin sleeves into position, sew in by top sewing. Pin front bands into position, sew on by top sewing. Join side and sleeve seams by top sewing.

instructions.as_text:
MAKING UP
Pin sleeves into position, sew in by
top sewing.
Left front band
Using 3.75mm needles cast on 9
sts. Work in rib as given for Back
until band is long enough when
slightly stretched to fit up left front
to commencement of neck shaping
finishing on a 2nd row.
Sl sts onto a safety pin. Break off
yarn.
Mark positions for buttons on left
front band, the first one 4 rows
from lower edge, allow for 1 in the
neckband and 6 more equally spaced
between.
Right front band
Using 3.75mm needles cast on 9 sts.
Work 4 rows in rib as given for
back.
Next row (buttonhole row) -
Rib 3, cast off 2, rib to end.
Next row - Rib to end casting on 2
sts over cast off sts.
Continue in rib working buttonholes
to correspond with positions
marked for buttons finishing on a
2nd row.
Do not break off yarn.
Neckband
With right side facing, using 3.75mm
needles, rib 9 sts from right front
band, pick up and K11 (13, 15, 15, 17,
17, 17, 17) sts up right side neck, K9
(9, 9, 9, 11, 11, 11, 11) sts from right
sleeve top, 25 (25, 27, 27, 27, 27, 29,
29) sts from back neck st holder, 9
(9, 9, 9, 11, 11, 11, 11) sts from left
sleeve top, pick up and K11 (13, 15,
15, 17, 17, 17, 17) sts down left side
neck and rib 9 sts from left front
band. 83 (87, 93, 93, 101, 101, 103,
103) sts.
Work 7 rows in rib working a
buttonhole as before on the 4th and
5th rows.
Cast off in rib.
Pin front bands into position, sew on
by top sewing.
Join side and sleeve seams by top
sewing.
Sew on buttons.
